//Cinema Salon
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stddef.h>
struct Sans
{
    int date;
    int startTime;
    int endTime;
    int salonCapacity;
    char filmName;
};
struct Salon
{
    struct *Sans;
    char sound;
    char display; 
};
struct Film 
{
    int filmLen;
    char content;
    char summary;
    char castName;
}
